rev.desc.rev.desc: Changes made to allow for the mapping of arrays of structures. High-level algorithm: get the data types for the subelements of the array of structure being mapped, then within the existing loop panel for arrays (map.fields.2d), add processing to take care of the subelements of the structure. MODIFIED panels: map.fields.2d. NEW panels: get.joindef, build.joindef.qry, select.joindef, set.evfile.nojoindef, init.primary, build.primary.qry, select.primary, check.primary, decide.check.attr, init.attr, build.attr.qry, select.attr, check.attr, decide.continue, init.dbdict, build.dbdict.qry, select.dbdict, set.struc.types, set.struc.types.1, set.struc.types.2
Added scmsg function for internationalization of messages.

descript.descript: Changes made to allow for the mapping of arrays of structures. MODIFIED panels include: map.fields.1. NEW panels include get.struc.types, build.dbdict.qry, select.dbdict, set.struc.types, set.struc.types.1, set.struc.types.2, map.fields.2d.

Changes made to allow for the mapping of arrays of structures. MODIFIED panels include: map.fields.1. NEW panels include get.struc.types, build.dbdict.qry, select.dbdict, set.struc.types, set.struc.types.1, set.struc.types.2, map.fields.2d.
Added scmsg function for internationalization of messages.
